fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: incomplete_application_text
fields.fieldText: Please ensure that you either are the owner of the property or have a licensed contractor for your trade application, you will not be allowed to continue the application.

fields.name: Will_you_occupy_the_property_for_at_least_1_year_after_obtaining_the_Certificate
fields.fieldText: Will you occupy the property for at least 1 year after obtaining the Certificate of Completion/Occupancy?

fields.name: Do_you_have_a_completed_Owner_s_Consent_Form
fields.fieldText: Do you have a completed Owner's Consent Form?

fields.name: owner_consent_helper_text
fields.fieldText: Consent is required from the property owner(s) if an agent will act on their behalf. A separate form is required from each owner. Consent is valid for 1 year from date of notary, unless otherwise specified. Owner's Consent form can be found here: https://www.townofclaytonnc.org/239/Permits-Applications

fields.name: Do_you_have_a_licensed_contractor_rb
fields.fieldText: Do you have a licensed contractor?

fields.name: property_occupancy_helper_text
fields.fieldText: State Law N.C.G.S 87-1 provides exemption for building construction projects where the PROPERTY OWNER intends to solely occupy the building being altered or built on his/her own property. If the building is not occupied solely by the property owner for at least 12 months following completion of the project, it is presumed that the property owner did not intend to solely occupy the building. If the property owner meets these criteria, he can, in essence, act as his own general contractor and perform the duty of superintending the construction project himself and thus, is exempt from the requirement of hiring a licensed general contractor. However, the law does not allow the property owner to obtain a building permit under this exemption and then delegate his duty to superintend the construction project to an unlicensed person.

fields.name: Does_your_scope_of_work_include_Fire_Suppression_Relocation_extension_modificati
fields.fieldText: Does your scope of work include Fire Suppression, Relocation, extension, modification of an existing system, or Structural modification?

fields.name: Are_any_trades_going_to_have_the_same_contractor
fields.fieldText: Are any trades going to have the same contractor?

fields.name: Please_select_the_primary_contractor_s_trade_based_off_the_highest_Project_Total
fields.fieldText: Please select the primary contractor's trade
fields.helpText: If Commercial is selected, Primary Contractor's main trade should be based on whichever trade cost above is higher as it will affect fee amounts.

fields.name: Please_select_the_secondary_trade_s_that_the_contractor_shares1
fields.fieldText: Please select the secondary trade(s) that the contractor shares

fields.name: Please_select_the_secondary_trade_s_that_the_contractor_shares2
fields.fieldText: Please select the secondary trade(s) that the contractor shares

fields.name: Please_select_the_secondary_trade_s_that_the_contractor_shares3
fields.fieldText: Please select the secondary trade(s) that the contractor shares

fields.name: Please_select_the_secondary_trade_s_that_the_contractor_shares4
fields.fieldText: Please select the secondary trade(s) that the contractor shares

fields.name: Will_you_need_Power_Disconnect_and_Reconnect
fields.fieldText: Will you need Power Disconnect and Reconnect?

fields.name: Disconnect_Reconnect_Note
fields.fieldText: NOTE: To permit holder, it is your responsibility to contact your utility provider to coordinate utility disconnect

fields.name: Will_any_underground_electrical_work_be_performed
fields.fieldText: Will any underground electrical work be performed?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please do not leave the fields empty, application intake is not yet completed.

fields.name: no_existing_gas_helper_text
fields.fieldText: If gas system is not existing, please contact local gas utility provider for installation procedure.

fields.name: Design_Professional_Helper_Text
fields.fieldText: Note: For guidelines as to when a Design Professional is required for a commercial trade, please refer to: https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/NCAPC2018/chapter-2-administrative-policies#NCAPC2018_Ch02_Sec204.3.5
